FATAL ERROR in native method: processing of -javaagent failed
Generate entities with MySQL where there is a field with dataType boolean. The generated attribute is of type Object.
Dali generates a Java data type of java.lang.Object because DTP returns null when asked for the column's data type. See the blocking bug 201957.
